quote.text: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quote.author: Rumi

scripture.text: When you go through deep waters, I will be with you.

message:
Good morning, Ms Sunshine ☀️

Before the world starts rushing in. Let yourself feel calm for a moment.... Get ready to kill the day like i know you will You’re already doing so much, becoming so much, and shining more than you see.

Just know this morning .. you don’t walk alone. I’m thinking of you, rooting for you, and I hope today meets you with joy and little moments that remind you how incredible you are.

Go be the gentle person you are Ms sunshine 💛
